ygData.subject: Re: Need help
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia wiped the tears from her eyes with his finger. Be strong my leader, he perished for the predacon cause, he died for you. when he got in trouble who was

Phobia wiped the tears from her eyes with his finger. "Be strong my 
leader, he perished for the predacon cause, he died for you. when he 
got in trouble who was there? megatron? no it was you in the thick of 
things, you who he put his trust in." he was choosing his words 
cautiously trying to boost her spirits. "The only way to be a good 
leader isn't to worry about those who passed on but those who you can 
make stronger." he held his hand to his side, tears dripping down 
it, "The dead are irrelevant" he snapped his hand to the side 
splashing the tears to the floor of the ship. "We must carry on under 
your leadership so our fellow Predacons know you care about survival. 
show them this side and they'll know you won't put them through any 
risk you wouldn't take." those are signs of leadership the traitor 
Megatron will never have."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She looked up at Phobia with tear stained cheeks. "He's gone.  I..I 
> couldn't save him. I tried to, but he didn't make it."  She stood 
up 
> and looked at Phobia with tears running down her face.  This was 
the 
> first time she had ever faced death like this.  It scared her to 
see 
> someone that she had known, die in her arms like that. She hoped 
that 
> it would never happen again. But knew that one day, it might.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Phobia set the ship on auto and approached KitKat
> > 
> > "How is he?" Phobia already suspected the answer, but wondered 
just 
> > how strong KitKat could be.
> >
